summary: This document is an email chain discussing a Daily Mail interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The initial email alerts recipients to the interview's publication, and a follow-up email requests the full interview when it becomes available.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted while she is incarcerated; the email chain is about obtaining and discussing this interview.

events.title: Daily Mail Publishes Ghislaine Maxwell Prison Interview
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell, who speaks from behind bars for the first time.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison, published by the Daily Mail on or around November 14, 2021.
The email chain shows internal communication about monitoring media coverage of Maxwell.
The correspondence indicates an effort to obtain the full text of the published interview.
